title: Shurima Art Contest
body:
Dear Riot
I'm planning to enter this contest and I'm just making sure if I can draw this quote from Shurima lure Amumu: The sad mummy can sometimes be heard weeping in the desert, despairing that he’ll never know the solace of friendship.
I'm just making sure :D 
thanks you :D
<3 Support ;)

replies.body: Yup anything from the shurima page is fine - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/shurima/intro

thank you :)
good luck to me :D
